item.title: AUCTF 2020 Writeup - Thanksgiving Dinner
item.description: Intro This is the second pwn challenge of AUCTF 2020. It was solved 238 times and it was worth 408 points. Description: I just ate a huge dinner. I can barley eat anymore… so please don’t give me too much! nc challenges.auctf.com 30011 Note: ASLR is disabled for this challenge You could download the binary here. $ sha256sum ./thanksgiving_dinner 2307af59beead6a2377c3beb2ff26f70d5732ec6b651b5c31e58b8f692bfb70c thanksgiving_dinner Exploitation The program simply ask for an input.
